amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to prohibiting tax increases on small businesses, as defined by the Small Business Administration but generally 500 employees or less.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3292 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3292 proposed by Senator Daines. (consideration: CR S6232-6233; text: CR S6232-6233) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to prohibiting tax increases on small businesses, as defined by the Small Business Administration but generally 500 employees or less.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3292 proposed by Senator Daines.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3292 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
